channel.title: Insidiax cache download problem [Help Please] UPLOADED PIC
channel.description:
Ok Im Making a webclient. i have used this tutorial: [url=http://www.google.com/forums/showthread.php?68794-How-to-Make-a-Webclient-(For-newer-Versions-of-PI-DSPK-Clients)]http://www.google.com/forums/showthread.php?68794-How-to-Make-a-Webclient-(For-newer-Versions-of-PI-DSPK-Clients)[/url]
I have added the cache links in client.java and cachedownloader.java but i get this error when it tries to download the cache
[CODE]java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\BattleReality.cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The sy stem cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:97) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:115) at client.startUp(client.java:9163) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:214) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:144) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:115) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53) at Update.<init>(Update.java:29) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4796) at client.startUp(client.java:9173) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)
[/CODE]
What the problem?
P.s: The cache link's end with .zip
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/aw5d2f.png[/img]

item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“josh124, post:7, topic:436988”]It’s Ok i think i resolved the problem.
The file is called maplocations so i have copied that file renamed it to mapConfig.txt and kept both files just incase.[/quote]
Nice one, good to see your trying:3.

Read full topic

item.title: Insidiax cache download problem [Help Please] UPLOADED PIC
item.dc:creator: @josh124 josh124
item.description:
@josh124 wrote:

Ok Im Making a webclient. i have used this tutorial: http://www.google.com/forums/showthread.php?68794-How-to-Make-a-Webclient-(For-newer-Versions-of-PI-DSPK-Clients)

I have added the cache links in client.java and cachedownloader.java but i get this error when it tries to download the cache

[CODE]java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\BattleReality.cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The sy
stem cannot find the path specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(FileInputStream.java:138)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(FileInputStream.java:97)
at java.io.FileReader.(FileReader.java:58)
at client.setNewMaps(client.java:115)
at client.startUp(client.java:9163)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:6165)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)
java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(ZipFile.java:214)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(ZipFile.java:144)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(ZipFile.java:115)
at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53)
at Update.(Update.java:29)
at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4796)
at client.startUp(client.java:9173)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:6165)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)

[/CODE]

What the problem?

P.s: The cache link’s end with .zip

aw5d2f.png1280×800
